title: superme2
author: superme2
content: Hello,I would like to purchase Amazon Gift Cards at 75% of its value. Paying USDT TRXSend me your Telegram ID to PM for a deal. Interested in larger values.Carded or scammed cards will be rejected. Don't be fooled by my new account, you wont be able to scam me.Thanks!

comments.author: Podgor
comments.body: I can make an order on Amazon for you for 80% crypto
